pullrequest.title: Specify branch of homebrew test-bot when building bottles

content.raw: Looks good to me. just one point: in my previous implementation I tend to use a default value for the combo repo/branch. I'm fine in this case with be able to leave them empty (and see how the script handle it) but we need to specify in the description that empty values means default values somehow clear.
content.html: Looks good to me. just one point: in my previous implementation I tend to use a default value for the combo repo/branch. I'm fine in this case with be able to leave them empty (and see how the script handle it) but we need to specify in the description that empty values means default values somehow clear.
